location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government of Bombay, giving an account of his trip on the Challengerand the Vestalto Lingah [Bandar-e-Lengeh, Iran] to rescue various properties taken unlawfully from Shaikh Mohammed bin Quzeeb. In enclosure, translation of a letter on the same subject sent on the same day from Bruce to Sooltan bin Suggar, the Chieftain of Shargaa [Sharjah, UAE].
